ingredients.item: 1¼ tsp Star Kay White Almond Extract

instructions.step: Place the butter in the bowl of a mixer fitted with a whisk attachment. Whisk for approximately 10 minutes on high speed, until light in colour and double in volume. You will need to scrape the side of the bowl a couple of times during the whisking.
Add the almond extract and whisk for an additional minute. Decant into a bowl and keep in the fridge until ready to serve.
